actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend the Northwest Atlantic Fisheries Act of 1950 to permit U.S. participation in international enforcement of fish conservation in increased geographic areas, pursuant to the International Convention for the Northwest Atlantic Fisheries 1949.

summary.text: Permits, under the Northwest Atlantic Fisheries Act of 1950, the United States participation in international enforcement of fish conservation in increased geographic areas specified by the International Commission for the Northwest Atlantic Fisheries, pursuant to the International Convention for the Northwest Atlantic Fisheries, 1949. (Amends 16 U.S.C. 981).

titles.title: A bill to amend the Northwest Atlantic Fisheries Act of 1950 to permit U.S. participation in international enforcement of fish conservation in increased geographic areas, pursuant to the International Convention for the Northwest Atlantic Fisheries 1949.
